name: Pachinko With Nick
description:
WHAT

Launch me into the machine and watch me tumble chaotically among pins, spinners, and pinball bumpers. Tilt the machine to jostle me loose if I get stuck somewhere. Earn more Nicks to play with by landing me in comfortable chairs and couches :] If you miss I go for a swim!

HOW

Shoot a Nick: Down Arrow
Tilt: Left / Right Arrows
Confirm Name Entry: Spacebar

Use the Tilt to jostle Nicks that get stuck.
Earn as many nicks as you can and beat my high score!
